Name: One Manga Day
About the game: Manga are comics created in Japan. The problem for most people is, as they're made in Japan they're only produced in Japanese; someone has to translate them to English! Is one man able to accomplish this? Is there more to his team's relationships other than business? Can everything in a translator's life be simple and clear? Girls in swimsuits. Everyone likes girls in swimsuits! Unique graphics, story, music. All was made especially for this game. Four endings: 2 bad endings, one normal and one good. Two languages: English and Russian. Achievements: To get all 12 achievements you need to play about an hour or two.
Meta Title: One Manga Day: May 4, 2015, DeXP and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on One Manga Day? Check out the release date (May 4, 2015), developer insights from DeXP, and a complete game summary.
